name: standards
schema:
CREATE TABLE `standards` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`name` text NOT NULL,
	`short_name` text,
	`slug` text NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`website` text,
	`logo` text,
	`organization` text,
	`standard_type` text,
	`created_at` integer,
	`updated_at` integer,
	FOREIGN KEY (`organization`) REFERENCES `organizations`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action
)
